item.title: Projects
item.description: Army ANT FeedArchive ANT Juggle Juggle Mobile Breadcrumbs Ciclope Army ANT Army ANT is an information retrieval research framework that supports experimentation with classical approaches, while also providing a high-level abstraction that motivates the implementation of innovative approaches in a shared evaluation environment.
